title: Alternatives: whole school approach to teaching English
creator_credit: Andrew Scollo, John Moore and Open Channel Productions
brief_description: A program about the importance of language in learning. It shows how three teachers in quite different Melbourne post-primary schools try to meet the language needs of students from non-English-speaking backgrounds.
